specialTalents.name: Demonic Possession.
specialTalents.description: Gain a +1 bonus to your damage rolls that lasts 5 rounds. In addition, add half your level to the damage bonus (round down).

specialTalents.name: Implacable.
specialTalents.description: You have advantage on Constitution checks to resist injury, poison, or endure extreme environments.

reward.name: Warcamp.
reward.value: Upon reaching the title of Warleader a half-orc may establish or build a Warcamp. When the construction is complete, a number of followers will arrive to serve.
